name: Penasulia
startIntroPart1: Pardon me for poor choice of words, we come in peace.
startIntroPart2: Chia to nuta dae amigo dei camita! I am Naomi the Pious, princess of Gamou house, very pleased to collaborate with you!
declaringWar: We come to civilize you, please do not resist!
attacked: There is no surprise, this day would have came earlier.
defeated: Nobody is innocent, this is fair to us, GG.
introduction: Thou are not worthy of our attention.
neutralLetsHearIt: Wanna cup o tea mr ambassador?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Bon voyage me old cream cracker!

name: Chizchia
startIntroPart2: Let's hang out around the deepest reef!
declaringWar: You are the barrier of the mankind progression!
defeated: As long as the Chizchia stands, liberalism shall stand...
neutralNo: This is harmful for the enviroment.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
